effects.display_string: Set: Each time you take damage you have a chance to activate Luck of the Draw! causing you to cast Survival Instincts for 4.0 sec. Your damage done is increased by 15% for 8 sec after Luck of the Draw! activates.
Set: After you gain  Luck of the Draw! your next 10 Druid abilities cast another Druid ability at 125% effectiveness.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 588,813 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Agility. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 60,557 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Use: Zap yourself for 223,108 Nature damage, gaining 15,008 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Standard of the Guardian

spells.description: Equip: You champion the cause of Gnomeregan.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
